name: deck.gl
description: A suite of 3D-enabled data visualization overlays, suitable for react-map-gl

scripts.start: (cd examples/layer-browser && (path-exists node_modules || npm i) && npm run start-local)
scripts.build-clean: rm -fr dist dist-es6 && mkdir -p dist dist-es6
scripts.build-es6: rm -fr dist-es6 && babel src --out-dir dist-es6 --source-maps inline
scripts.build-es5: rm -fr dist && babel src --out-dir dist --plugins=transform-es2015-modules-commonjs --source-maps inline
scripts.build: npm run build-clean && npm run build-es6 && npm run build-es5
scripts.cover: NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter html --reporter cobertura --reporter=lcov npm run test-cover
scripts.lint: npm run pretty && eslint src test examples && npm run lint-yarn
scripts.lint-yarn: !(grep -q unpm.u yarn.lock) && echo 'Lockfile valid.' || (echo 'Please rebuild yarn file using public npmrc' && false)
scripts.publish-prod: npm run build && npm run test && npm run test-dist && npm publish
scripts.publish-beta: npm run build && npm run test && npm run test-dist && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test-node
scripts.test-cover: NODE_ENV=test tape -r babel-register test/node.js && nyc report
